spell_tooltip.description: Your Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Freedom spells now have 1 additional charge.

Your allies affected by your Aura gain an effect after you cast Blessing of Protection or Blessing of Freedom.

 lessing of Protection
Physical damage reduced by 30% for 6 sec.

 lessing of Freedom
Cleared of all movement impairing effects.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 21,062 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Learn Concentration Aura and Devotion Aura:

oncentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 evotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Learn Retribution Aura and Crusader Aura:

 etribution Aura:
When any party or raid member within 40 yds takes more than 30% of their health in damage in a single hit, each member gains 5% increased damage and healing, decaying over 30 sec. This cannot occur within 30 sec of the aura being applied.

 rusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 20,542 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Increases the duration of Divine Steed by 2 sec.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 5,444 Holy damage to an enemy, or 13,548 healing to an ally.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for 30 sec. When you Holy Shock, targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for 13,428 or healed for 14,341, split evenly among them. Glimmer of Light's total healing and damage is increased by 4% for each target affected.

You may have Glimmer of Light on up to 3 targets.

When Glimmer of Light is dispelled, its effect is activated at 100% value.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 7,809.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

rusader Aura: Mount speed bonus increased to 60%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 21,052 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

enerates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.

Learn Concentration Aura and Devotion Aura:

oncentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 evotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

Learn Retribution Aura and Crusader Aura:

 etribution Aura:
When any party or raid member within 40 yds takes more than 30% of their health in damage in a single hit, each member gains 5% increased damage and healing, decaying over 30 sec. This cannot occur within 30 sec of the aura being applied.

 rusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Increases the duration of Divine Steed by 2 sec.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage and healing done by 15% for 20 sec, and allowing Hammer of Wrath to be cast on any target.

Combines with other Avenging Wrath abilities, granting all known Avenging Wrath effects while active.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 464 every 0.8 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 20%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Golden Path strikes the lowest health ally within it an additional time for 100% of its effect.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 1,545.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Holy Power abilities have a 10% chance to make your next Holy Power ability free and deal 10% increased damage and healing.
Haste increased by 4% and Judgment cooldown reduced by 1.0 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

lessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 20% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

lessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 5% For 10 sec.

lessing of Dawn:
Blessing of Dawn increases the damage and healing of your next Holy Power spending ability by an additional 10%.

lessing of Dusk:
Blessing of Dusk increases your armor by 10% and your Holy Power generating abilities cooldown 10% faster.
Holy Shock's healing and damage is increased by 5%.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to 25 yds.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Holy Shock every 5 sec. This effect lasts 15 sec.
Your Crusader Strike now also grants you 2% increased Intellect for 6 sec. Multiple applications may overlap.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 5,491 Holy damage to an enemy, or 13,713 healing to an ally.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for 30 sec. When you Holy Shock, targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for 13,322 or healed for 14,729, split evenly among them. Glimmer of Light's total healing and damage is increased by 4% for each target affected.

You may have Glimmer of Light on up to 3 targets.

When Glimmer of Light is dispelled, its effect is activated at 100% value.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 7,888.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

rusader Aura: Mount speed bonus increased to 60%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Glimmer of Light's healing and damage.
Aura Mastery also increases all healing received by party or raid members within 40 yards by 10%.
Glimmer of Light can affect 5 additional targets.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 30% health, they absorb the next 100,481 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Hurls a Light-infused hammer to the ground, dealing 1,830 Holy damage to nearby enemies and healing up to 6 nearby allies for 3,631, every 2 sec for 14 sec.
When you cast Word of Glory on someone other than yourself, you are also healed for 50% of the amount healed.

Shield of the Righteous deals 14,253 damage to its first target struck.

Every 5 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn cost no Holy Power.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 10% of the amount healed.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to 40 yds.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at 30% reduced effectiveness.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your critical strike chance by 15% for 20 sec.

ombines with other Avenging Wrath abilities.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for 25 sec, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 20%.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
Absorb your active Glimmer of Lights, triggering their effects at 200% value and granting 2,000 Mana per Glimmer of Light consumed.

Your auras restore 1,848 health to 3 injured allies within 20 yds every 2 sec.

While Aura Mastery is active, heals all allies within 40 yds and healing is increased by 20%.
After casting Daybreak, your next 3 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for 25 sec, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 20%.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.

Judgment empowers your next Word of Glory to automatically activate Light of Dawn with 25% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every 20 sec.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 20,644 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Learn Concentration Aura and Devotion Aura:

oncentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 evotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

Learn Retribution Aura and Crusader Aura:

 etribution Aura:
When any party or raid member within 40 yds takes more than 30% of their health in damage in a single hit, each member gains 5% increased damage and healing, decaying over 30 sec. This cannot occur within 30 sec of the aura being applied.

 rusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.
Each Holy Power spent reduces the remaining cooldown on Hammer of Justice by 2 sec.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 20,542 damage dealt by the target.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage and healing done by 15% for 20 sec, and allowing Hammer of Wrath to be cast on any target.

Combines with other Avenging Wrath abilities, granting all known Avenging Wrath effects while active.
Judgment's damage is increased by 10%.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 464 every 0.8 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 20%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Haste increased by 4% and Judgment cooldown reduced by 1.0 sec.
Holy Shock's healing and damage is increased by 5%.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 5,401 Holy damage to an enemy, or 13,573 healing to an ally.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for 30 sec. When you Holy Shock, targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for 13,117 or healed for 14,567, split evenly among them. Glimmer of Light's total healing and damage is increased by 4% for each target affected.

You may have Glimmer of Light on up to 3 targets.

When Glimmer of Light is dispelled, its effect is activated at 100% value.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 7,844.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

rusader Aura: Mount speed bonus increased to 60%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec per Holy Power spent and restores 5% of your Mana.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Glimmer of Light's healing and damage.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 2.0 sec.
Glimmer of Light can affect 5 additional targets.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 30% health, they absorb the next 100,481 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Hurls a Light-infused hammer to the ground, dealing 1,830 Holy damage to nearby enemies and healing up to 6 nearby allies for 3,599, every 2 sec for 14 sec.
30% of Glimmer of Light's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 15% of your max health.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 10% of the amount healed.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to 25 yds.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and 4 injured allies within 30 yds for 8 sec.

All affected allies will be healed for 25% of the amount of your other healing done.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 200% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your critical strike chance by 15% for 20 sec.

ombines with other Avenging Wrath abilities.
Absorb your active Glimmer of Lights, triggering their effects at 200% value and granting 2,000 Mana per Glimmer of Light consumed.

Your auras restore 1,848 health to 3 injured allies within 20 yds every 2 sec.

While Aura Mastery is active, heals all allies within 40 yds and healing is increased by 20%.
After casting Daybreak, your next 3 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for 25 sec, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 20%.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.

Judgment empowers your next Word of Glory to automatically activate Light of Dawn with 25% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every 20 sec.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.

lessing of Dusk

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 5,419 Holy damage to an enemy, or 13,597 healing to an ally.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for 30 sec. When you Holy Shock, targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for 13,139 or healed for 14,692, split evenly among them. Glimmer of Light's total healing and damage is increased by 4% for each target affected.

You may have Glimmer of Light on up to 3 targets.

When Glimmer of Light is dispelled, its effect is activated at 100% value.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 8,081.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

rusader Aura: Mount speed bonus increased to 60%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Your Flash of Light heals for an additional 15% when cast on a target affected by your Beacon of Light.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
The healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 60%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Glimmer of Light's healing and damage.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 2.0 sec.
Hurls a Light-infused hammer to the ground, dealing 1,830 Holy damage to nearby enemies and healing up to 6 nearby allies for 3,641, every 2 sec for 14 sec.
When you cast Word of Glory on someone other than yourself, you are also healed for 50% of the amount healed.
While empowered by Infusion of Light, Flash of Light heals for an additional 20%, and Holy Light or Judgment refund 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 10% of the amount healed.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to 40 yds.
Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at 30% reduced effectiveness.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your critical strike chance by 15% for 20 sec.

ombines with other Avenging Wrath abilities.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for 25 sec, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 20%.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
Holy Shock and Crusader Strike refund up to 10% of their Mana cost and deal up to 50% more healing or damage, based on the target's missing health.
Absorb your active Glimmer of Lights, triggering their effects at 200% value and granting 2,000 Mana per Glimmer of Light consumed.
After casting Daybreak, your next 3 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for 25 sec, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 20%.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.

Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, reduces the cost of Flash of Light by an additional 30%, and causes every 3 casts of Holy Light to generate an additional Holy Power.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Armor increased by 12%, Stamina increased by 6% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 6%.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Holy Power abilities have a 10% chance to make your next Holy Power ability free and deal 10% increased damage and healing.
Haste increased by 4% and Judgment cooldown reduced by 1.0 sec.
Each Holy Power you spend has a 5% chance to cause your Consecration to flare up, dealing 4,217 Holy damage to up to 5 enemies standing within it.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

lessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 20% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

lessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 5% For 10 sec.

lessing of Dawn:
Blessing of Dawn increases the damage and healing of your next Holy Power spending ability by an additional 10%.

lessing of Dusk:
Blessing of Dusk increases your armor by 10% and your Holy Power generating abilities cooldown 10% faster.
Holy Shock's healing and damage is increased by 5%.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Holy Shock every 5 sec. This effect lasts 15 sec.
Your Crusader Strike now also grants you 2% increased Intellect for 6 sec. Multiple applications may overlap.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 5,442 Holy damage to an enemy, or 13,667 healing to an ally.

enerates 1 Holy Power.

Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for 30 sec. When you Holy Shock, targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for 13,154 or healed for 14,450, split evenly among them. Glimmer of Light's total healing and damage is increased by 4% for each target affected.

You may have Glimmer of Light on up to 3 targets.

When Glimmer of Light is dispelled, its effect is activated at 100% value.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 7,728.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

rusader Aura: Mount speed bonus increased to 60%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Glimmer of Light's healing and damage.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 2.0 sec.
Glimmer of Light can affect 5 additional targets.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 30% health, they absorb the next 100,481 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Hurls a Light-infused hammer to the ground, dealing 1,830 Holy damage to nearby enemies and healing up to 6 nearby allies for 3,636, every 2 sec for 14 sec.
30% of Glimmer of Light's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 15% of your max health.

Shield of the Righteous deals 14,282 damage to its first target struck.

Every 5 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn cost no Holy Power.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 10% of the amount healed.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to 25 yds.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and 4 injured allies within 30 yds for 8 sec.

All affected allies will be healed for 25% of the amount of your other healing done.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 200% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your critical strike chance by 15% for 20 sec.

ombines with other Avenging Wrath abilities.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for 25 sec, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 20%.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
Absorb your active Glimmer of Lights, triggering their effects at 200% value and granting 2,000 Mana per Glimmer of Light consumed.

Learn Concentration Aura and Devotion Aura:

oncentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 evotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

Learn Retribution Aura and Crusader Aura:

 etribution Aura:
When any party or raid member within 40 yds takes more than 30% of their health in damage in a single hit, each member gains 5% increased damage and healing, decaying over 30 sec. This cannot occur within 30 sec of the aura being applied.

 rusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

This effect's bonus damage cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health and its bonus healing cannot exceed 100% of your maximum health.
